item.title: About me
item.description: Hi, I am a Master in Financial Analysis (MFA2021) student at London Business School. Before starting my masters program here in London, I studied Business Administration at the University of St.Â Gallen in Switzerland. After, graduating in 2018, I took an extended GAP year to gain more experience in all the field that fascinate me. Therefore, I started with a four-month Data Science Bootcamp at ETH Zurich where I developed together with a physicist a AI-based prediction platform for time series data.
